name: Plan Z
description:
Plan Z
A game in which the world plunged into war after the spread of an unknown virus.Take part in battles for different characters.You must destroy hordes of monsters to be picked up by a rescue helicopter
Get special currency for killing monsters in order to survive.You can spend your currency on weapons, ammo, turrets, upgrades, and grenades.You can team up with other people or your friends to face off against hordes of enemies.
